ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thamud gave the lie to the warnings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The people of Thamud rejected Our warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: The tribe of Thamud denied the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thamood cried lies to the warnings
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: The tribe of Thamud also rejected Our warnings:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And the Thamud belied the warnings.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: [The people of] Thamud denied the warnings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:23] Thamūd denied the warnings (nudhur is the plural of nadhīr, with the sense of mundhir), that is to say, [they denied] those matters which their prophet Sālih warned them of if they refused to believe in him and to follow him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((The tribe of) Thamud) the folk of Salih (rejected warnings) disbelieved in Salih as well as in all the messengers.
